venue.name: Lahey Clinic Medical Center - North Shore

item.description:
Park in North Shore Mall's Lahey Clinic (on Rt 128 side). NOT Liberty Tree Mall that's just further north.

WE Bike thru Peabody, Danvers, to Ipswich River in Middleton.
(7.4 miles one way?).

More info to follow soon. Thanks Norm.

http://www.traillink.com/trail/independence-greenway.aspx

There is a section that requires 'on street' biking so use caution and monitor your own comfortability.

MAP:Â http://www.peabody-ma.gov/comm_dev/IndependenceGreenwayMap.pdf
item.name: Independence Greenway...now this is a new one
